text: Midrash Abba Gorion is a late midrash to the Book of Esther, and may be considered one of the smaller midrashim. The name derives from that of the tanna Abba Gorion of Sidon, who is one of the authorities mentioned in this midrash. == External links == *Sifre de-agadeta Category:Smaller midrashim
title: Midrash Abba Gorion
